content: Prepaid2Coin LLC is an OTC Desk specializing in serving traditionally underserved consumers.Anybody who is looking for a method to buy BTC using Onevanilla or other prepaid Visa/MC Gift cards can use Prepaid2Coin. It's a platform I helped create where you can buy BTC instantly using any Visa/MC Gift Card. We're currently in closed beta and are taking new users. Many of our users currently enjoy using Onevanillas and Green Dot cards. Â We also have many users who have used our site to liquidate old unused gift cards they had laying around. Prepaid2Coin LLC is registered with FinCen as a MSB and follows all applicable laws and regulations. Anyone with any questions feel free to ask.
